content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani

content: Good afternoon! Thank you for coming to view the apartment. Based on the size and location, I was considering a rental price of €600 per month. What is your offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want to negotiate a lower price. How about €550 per month?

Can you tell me anything about the apartment?
name: Maria Mamani

content: Of course! The apartment is located in the heart of the city, close to major attractions and transportation hubs. It has two bedrooms and a small kitchen, making it perfect for a couple or a single person. The bathroom is also quite modern and well-maintained. The apartment also features a balcony with a view of the city.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of €570 per month.

Thank you for your understanding. Can you tell me what the lease term is?
name: Maria Mamani

content: Sure! The lease term for this apartment is one year, with the possibility of renewal for another year. The security deposit is €1,000, which will be returned to you at the end of the lease term, provided that there are no damages or unpaid rent.
name: Heinrich Heine
